posts.post_content:
I have 3 more T206's for sale. Due to the massive snow storms my brother and I haven't been able to get together to make a bigger list of cards for sale. here are 3 that I have right now :  all the cards from my last post sold to the same person right after I had posted. 

 Hughie Jennings "both hands in air" Piedmont 350  PSA 1- $30 SOLD
 Red Murray "Portrait" Piedmont 350-460 PSA 5  - $90
 Bill Dahlen Boston "Portrait" Piedmont 150 PSA 3 - $39

 Shipping is $4.00 for one card or 2, insurance is extra

 I have pics available upon request
